title: OKMPA Coffee with Crew
description: Free monthly film and TV industry networking by the Oklahoma Motion Picture Alliance (OKMPA). First Friday of every month, 8–10 a.m. Open to all—producers, crew, actors, students. OKC: Kamp's 1910 Café (10 NE 10th St, Suite 209). Tulsa: Circle Cinema (10 S Lewis Ave). Free coffee; board updates on legislation and industry news.
schedule: First Friday of each month, 8–10 a.m.
